Don't waste your time. The game goes from fun to incredibly sweaty in the space of 50 hours play time. You upgrade your character thinking it will do something, but all that happens is you get matched against better and better players.

Think about it.

The better you get at the game, the harder the competition is and they are always that bit better.

Do you have 10 hours a day to throw into it to keep up?

Then don't bother.

Another game ruined by Skill Based Match Making.

This game is highly unbanlaced for the killer side . And the only things that devs do is to make skin for character . 

They are only 2/3 killer who are good, the other are just not fun to play at high elo, you just get 5 gen, and you can't do anything about it cuz the survivors knows the weakness of the killer your playing . And some perks / items  should just not exist ( Decisive Strike, No Head, Brand New Part, The Key), these perk are not fun to play against, even if you did a good chase on killer / survivor side, these perks will remind you that your whole chase was useless cuz of this perk . 

I'll expalin how a chase is down, alright you load into the game, after 20 sec of searching you find your first survivor, the time for you to have your FIRST hit is, we'll say 30 sec ( maybe he have sprint burst so it's even harder, or he's really good etc ... ) So, this time is an "aproximation", so were at 50 seconds of chasing now, and for you to have the final hit is 15 seconds, cuz he was in a dead zone and that he previously t-bagged you cuz he drop a pallet on you so he lose some time . So, for one chase, with a DECENT player, we're at 75 seconds .
And one generator with 1 survivor on it, is 80 seconds ( but he can have a toolbox or some perk that makes less time to do a generator )

SO, for one chase with a DECENT player, if the 3 other survivor spawn on a different generator, there is 3 on your five generator who are down for ONE chase with a DECENT player .

And this is on the case that is not a SWF ( survivor with friends ), cuz on this game you can bodyblock the killer, so even if your chasing someone, and that he is one hit away to get downed, survivor can block you, and even if they miss, they maybe have flashlight who can save the survivor . Yeah

This game is based on survivor mistake, but in high mmr, the numbers of mistakes are really low, and if you have a SWF, it's even lower . So for you to play the game ( at HIGH ELO, and win, which for me is like 3 man killed and the other one escape with door / hatch ), u'll need a great killer, some goods perks, some camping cuz even if you have a good killer, the gen are just too efficient with really good player, so u'll need to camp someone so they go to tier II, or the game is hardly winnable .

And still, the devs prefer to remake some illustration of survivors, instead of remaking some killer who really need it . 

It's fun how the survivors are pretty much the bulliers instead of the killer . 

BUT, if you just want to have fun with your friends or just alone, this game is pretty good at it . But if you want to play High Elo as Killer, be prepared fool .

Well, it's been 666 hours, so I think it's finally time for a review.

I've been playing this game on and off for a good four years now, sometimes more than other times. This game's concept is great, the music is fantastic (I ADORE Trickster's music), the game looks quite nice interms of graphics and honestly, it's quite fun.

There are, however, a couple of problems;
1. The Community
- How do I put this... yeah, the community just sucks. People are toxic douchebags for no reason, both new and veteran players alike. It can and most likely will suck the fun out of the game.

2. The bugs, the oh so many bugs
- As to likely no one's surprise, this game has been riddled with bugs since it's inception. I must admit, it's better than years ago, interms of both the amount and the time it takes for them to be fixed, but it is still a problem.

3. The Developers
- How do I put this in a nice way-... BEHAVIOR isn't-... great. My biggest gripe with them is the lack of communication/the way they communicate with us. Again, it's better than how it was years ago, but it's still not-... great. 
Remember Mathieu telling us to go play CIV instead?

4. Balance
This is a bit of a trickier one, as most, if not all, online games struggle with balancing. DBD is heavily balanced around the survivor side, which for someone like me who enjoys killer more, isn't great. Some loops are pretty undoable as some killers and the speed that generators are done is a bit-... TOO fast.

5. Pricing
They release A LOT of chapters and cosmetics, which are great but add up quickly, ESPECIALLY as a new player.

Despite all this, I will still give this game a positive review. I enjoy it, even after four years. I may not play it as much as I used to, but that's okay, it's still fun. It's a bit like League of Legends. (Which I've been playing for eight years now!) I don't enjoy it as much as I used to, but it's still a great game. (It's also quite similar with the whole love-hate relationship most people have with this game)

If you've got the money, go and get this game! (It's also great with friends!)

This game can be pretty fun but also stressful! I enjoy playing custom games with friends but its only really fun with a full lobby. Online can be a bit annoying if you get a really good killer or just one that likes to camp hooks or tunnel vision you until your dead. Good game over all tho I recommend if you like these type of games.

Seriously save yourself the time and money. The games is riddled with bugs and devs that for the most part don't do anything about hackers. The ingame report system doesn't work, it is literally a fake complaint button, no devs check it. (unless you go out of your way to go to the website and take 10 minutes just to report one person) 

They never add quality of life updates it took them 7 years to implement a wiggle mechanic that wouldn't give your controller drift. All these years and there still isn't a search bar even though there are like 100 perks for each roll, how does that make sense? 

They want labor of love, but don't put any love into the game or its player base. The only thing that is updated consistently is cosmetics because to BHVR  "money > the game working"

Когда я наиграл 60 часов, то сделал положительный обзор. Теперь после 300 часов делаю негативный.
Все изменения баланса и прочие новинки сделанные разработчиками убили игру. Давайте по порядку.
И раньше было "забавно", когда вам сурвам с бронзовым рейтингом кидают убийцу с золотым или даже радужным рангом. Занялись ли разработчики исправлением матчмейтинга? Неа, просто убрали обозначение рангов по итогу матча. Молодцы. что ещё сказать.
Все изменения перков и прочего делают игру за сурва с рандомами невозможной. Теперь игра за одного из имбаласных убийц стала ещё проще! Двадцать каток подряд нас убивали всех или выживал всего один счастливчик. Трижды спаслось двое. Собственно после двадцатой такой катки я и снёс игру.
Что касается убийц. Умеете за них играть - будете убивать сюрвов по щелчку пальцев, разработчики делают для этого всё возможное.
Я удалил игру и ещё скрыл из её библиотеки, чтобы она мне на глаза не попадалась. Никому её не рекомендую, особенно новичкам которых будут резать как котят.
之前都很不錯，也讓我玩了很久，但是現在各種不能登錄，每次錯誤的理由都不一樣，解決一個又跳出一個新的，永無止境，而且伺服器超級無敵不穩定，動不動就crash，頻率高到幾乎5場就有4場會斷線，遊戲是好玩的，但可以用心一點搞好伺服器嗎?玩得我一肚子火
